label: ball
caption: The little girl, dressed in a bright pink swimsuit and blue sunglasses, is excitedly holding up a red beach ball for her two energetic black dogs to see. The sun shines down on them as they playfully sniff and paw at the ball, while the girl laughs and tries to entice one of the dogs to catch it mid-air. Behind them, the sound of waves crashing and seagulls calling fills the air, adding to the joyous atmosphere of their beachside game.
